attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see an end to the rise and rise of fuel costs as it is now destroying the all ready weak economy, petrol prices are nearly a pound more than 15 years ago and i find it scandalous.

This Government seems to lack the same skills as the previous one and Gordon Brown was in office way longer than he deserved, but i see no improvement in imagination or intelligent thought.

Any more than a pound a litre is a liberty and should be addressed immediately.
